name: My Wedding Workbook
overview:
My Wedding Workbook is online wedding planning software that helps brides manage all their wedding details.

It is free of charge to users and was built to be easy-to-use and to cover every wedding-related event, including the engagement party, bridal shower, bachelor and bachelorette parties, rehearsal and rehearsal dinner, ceremony, reception, post-wedding brunch and honeymoon.

It offers a comprehensive suite of tools such as a wedding budget planner, guest list planer, RSVP tracker, gift tracker, thank you tracker, task calendar, vendor manager and much more.

My Wedding Workbook differs from other stand-alone tools because it’s tools all work together and are fully integrated. For example, if you were to enter in a budget, deposit and payment due details for your wedding reception favors, that information would also automatically be added to your wedding reception area as well as your task calendar. This way users never have to double-enter in any details.
